washed2.text_male: Hahahaha, no, no, have a look, he shat himself.
washed2.text_female: Hahahaha, no, no, have a look, she shat herself.

washed2.text: Ana, do you have your mobile? Take a picture!!

notWashed.text: You should wash your clothes, your pants are a real mess.
Don't you have a washing machine at home?

notWashed2.text: Hahahaha, new trend! Chewing gums stucked on the pants.
That awful clothing does not worth washing.

notWashed2.text_male: He should throw it straight to the trash can.
notWashed2.text_female: She should throw it straight to the trash can.

washed2.text: Well, it's okay, it'll be dry in a little while.

notTalked.text: You probably have sat on a chewing gum.

notTalked2.text: What a mess, go straight to the bathroom before class.

notTalked3.text: Yeah, maybe you are able to remove it.

talked.text: Try to take off that gum in the bathroom.
